Description: This policy is used to enforce vesting and allow transfers for those not in the vesting schedule

CallingFunctions.Name: Transfer
CallingFunctions.EncodedValues: address to, uint256 value, uint256 senderBalance, address sender

CallingFunctions.Name: TransferFrom
CallingFunctions.FunctionSignature: transferFrom(address from, address to, uint256 value)
CallingFunctions.EncodedValues: address from, address to, uint256 value, uint256 fromBalance

Rules.Name: Enforce Vesting (Cliff + Linear)
Rules.Description: 12-month cliff, then linear vesting until VestEnd (clamped after end).
Rules.Condition: ((GV:BLOCK_TIMESTAMP < TR:VestCliffEnd(sender)) AND (senderBalance < [TR:VestAmount(sender) + value])) OR ((GV:BLOCK_TIMESTAMP >= TR:VestCliffEnd(sender)) AND (senderBalance < [[TR:VestAmount(sender) * [TR:VestEnd(sender) - [GV:BLOCK_TIMESTAMP * [GV:BLOCK_TIMESTAMP < TR:VestEnd(sender)] + TR:VestEnd(sender) * [GV:BLOCK_TIMESTAMP >= TR:VestEnd(sender)]]] / 126144000] + value]))

Rules.Name: Enforce Vesting - transferFrom
Rules.Description: 12-month cliff, then linear vesting until VestEnd (clamped after end).
Rules.Condition: ((GV:BLOCK_TIMESTAMP < TR:VestCliffEnd(from)) AND (fromBalance < [TR:VestAmount(from) + value])) OR ((GV:BLOCK_TIMESTAMP >= TR:VestCliffEnd(from)) AND (fromBalance < [[TR:VestAmount(from) * [TR:VestEnd(from) - [GV:BLOCK_TIMESTAMP * [GV:BLOCK_TIMESTAMP < TR:VestEnd(from)] + TR:VestEnd(from) * [GV:BLOCK_TIMESTAMP >= TR:VestEnd(from)]]] / 126144000] + value]))
